# Project Documentation: DC Motor Control with Variable Speed

## 1. Project Overview

**Project Title:** DC Motor Speed Control with L298N and Potentiometer

**Description:** This project implements a variable speed control for a DC motor using an Arduino microcontroller, an L298N motor driver, and a potentiometer. The potentiometer allows the user to adjust the motor speed, while the Arduino controls the motor driver to regulate the voltage supplied to the motor. This project demonstrates fundamental concepts of motor control, PWM, and analog input.

**Functionality and Features:**

*   Variable speed control of a DC motor.
*   Adjustable speed via a potentiometer.
*   Uses PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) to control motor speed.
*   Simple and easy-to-understand circuit.
*   Direction control based on potentiometer position.
